titleStmt.title: The baterie of the Popes Botereulx, commonly called the high altare. Compiled by W.S. in the yere of oure Lorde. 1550
titleStmt.author: Salesbury, William, 1520?-1600?

publicationStmt.publisher: By [R. Grafton for] Robert Crowley, dwellyng in Elye tentes in Holburne,
publicationStmt.date: The yere of our Lord. M.D.L. [1550]]

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication and publisher's name from colophon; printer's name from STC.
